description: Narrates the fight between a Super Hero and a Super Villain

parameters.name: villain_name
parameters.description: The name of the Super Villain

parameters.name: villain_powers
parameters.description: The coma separated list of powers of the Super Villain
parameters.defaultValue: Accelerated Healing, Agility, Astral Projection, Cloaking, Danger Sense, Durability, Electrokinesis, Energy Blasts, Enhanced Hearing, Enhanced Senses, Force Fields, Hypnokinesis, Illusions, Intelligence, Jump, Light Control, Marksmanship, Precognition, Psionic Powers, Reflexes, Stealth, Super Speed, Telekinesis, Telepathy, The Force, Weapons Master

parameters.name: villain_level
parameters.description: A number representing the level of the Super Villain

parameters.name: hero_name
parameters.description: The name of the Super Hero

parameters.name: hero_powers
parameters.description: The coma separated list of powers of the Super Hero
parameters.defaultValue: Agility, Longevity, Marksmanship, Natural Weapons, Stealth, Super Strength, Weapons Master

parameters.name: hero_level
parameters.description: A number representing the level of the Super Hero
